name: Restoration Movement union
description: Union in Lexington (1832) is a milestone for the Disciples lineage.

name: Churches of Christ separation
description: Churches of Christ separated from the Disciples in 1906.

name: Independent Christian Churches separation
description: Independent Christian Churches separated from the Disciples between 1926 and 1971.

name: Church of the Nazarene formed
description: Church of the Nazarene formed in 1908.
